suggestedTasks.title: Review UI Consistency for Task Interaction Patterns
suggestedTasks.description:
Conduct a comprehensive review of task interaction patterns across all components to ensure uniform disabling and blocking mechanisms. This should include a systematic audit of /tasks and tasktable.svelte to identify and standardize UI state management for blocked tasks.

Focus on creating a centralized logic for task state management that can be consistently applied across different views and components.
suggestedTasks.reason: Discovered inconsistent UI state handling during button disabling implementation

gotchas: Ensure uniform state handling across different component views

documentationNeeds: Update UI interaction guidelines for task states
